title: Exercise
instruction: do 18 push ups

title: Journal
instruction: Write about a moment you will never forget in your life

title: Mindful
instruction: Settling in to bedtime, breathe in for a count of 4, hold 7, and exhale for 8. If you don't fall asleep it should at least bring down your heart rate

title: Stretch
instruction: Do a forward bend.  Hold for 10 seconds. Repeat 3 times

title: Journal
instruction: Reflect on the people in your life who have supported you. Perhaps later you reach out to catch up with them.

title: Journal
instruction: What are people's perception of you and what would you wish they would know about you?

title: Journal
instruction: What makes you feel most energized?

title: Journal
instruction: List your non-negotiables in life

title: Journal
instruction: What you say yes to, what you say no to. Commit to them.

title: Mindful
instruction: Find a comfortable spot, meditate for 20 minutes.

title: Mindful
instruction: Find a routine you enjoy and take your time to eek it out. Notice if slowing down speeds things up.

title: Mindful
instruction: Observe your thoughts for fifteen minutes. Self-study.

title: Mindful
instruction: In your yoga class, forget the fancy poses, focus on Savasana (corpse pose) at the end of the practice. Where did it take you? Besides zzzzz.

title: Social
instruction: In transit? Take a different route to your next destination, never know who you'll meet.

title: Social
instruction: Play a few rounds of 'Never have I ever'. No drinking required, although you may get more mileage out of others. In vino veritas.

title: Social
instruction: With a loved one, or maybe close friends, whisper your favorite ice cream flavor in your most dirtiest voice... ever.

title: Social
instruction: Karaoke night. Bohemian Rhapsody. Whatever song you choose, do it with verve, break the glass windows on the storefront.

title: Art
instruction: Make a vision board

title: Art
instruction: Knit

title: Art
instruction: Listen to music. Explore a platform i.e. YouTube, Spotify for new music you haven't heard yet.

title: Wild card
instruction: Having a bad day? If at first you don't succeed. Eat a cupcake (or whatever you want).

title: Wild card
instruction: Silliness abound. Grab some straws, box of Whoppers (or marshmallows), 1 bowl/plate. At one go, all players get 30 sec to use straw to suck whopper from bowl to hand. Winner who has most stuffs all into their cheeks and takes selfie. But be safe.
